data.name: Nocturne
data.description:
Nocturne is a virtual reality musical instrument which is designed for emotional depth and power. The magic of making music doesn't require years of practice anymore.

• Create: Explore the connection between music and emotion with your compositions.
• Songbook: Train your ear with a library of original songs to play along with, rhythm-game style.
• New: Customize the instrument's shape. Play with a linear keyboard, circular or spiral keyboard.
• New: Choose from preset sounds, or twist knobs to further customize the built-in voices. Take creative control!
• New: Record your creations to lossless audio and overdub them to create songs and soundscapes.

changelog.change_log: This patch makes sure the keyboard is the default instrument when the app starts.

This version is probably going to be our first commercial release!
- New instrument shapes
- New sounds
- Synth knobs and ability to tweak sound
- New environments
- Recording / Playback /  saving Wav files

This build will be the first commercial build the the game. Soon there will be updates!

- New instrument shapes - linear and circular
- New voices
- New record/playback functionality
- New graphics
This version has microphone permissions disabled, which is important to the review process.
Switches from stage to floor based tracking.
Fixes a bug where the menu was blocked by another menu.
This release fixes a bug where the arrows, which are supposed to be behind the player, can appear in front of the player.

This release adds some improvements to the Christmas update:
-Nocturne now remembers which hand you're using in between tracks.
-The player starts out pointed in the correct direction now.
-The visualization on The Workshop song has been changed back to stars.

Merry Christmas!
This release contains:
NEW CONTENT:
-5 classic Christmas songs
-1 new patch
-2 new wands of different lengths.
NEW FEATURES:
-Option to push buttons on main menu instead of using laser.
-Information HUD on pitch and amplitude when playing.
-Scenery on new levels
-Redesigned spiral
BUG FIXES
-Instrument no longer plays when not in focus, minimizing unwanted sounds.
